page.title: 12Mr. S. a Villager
page.content: Mr S lives at 6 Old Road Brixton near our school steps. He was born in 1910 and is 74 years old. He has lived in Brixton all his life. He went to our school and left at 12 years old. He went to work at Yealmbridge Sawmill for 5 shillings (25p) a week. As a boy he played in the woods around Brixton and played tricks on the local gamekeeper. They didn't go far from home in those days. They even walked to work. He later worked in the saw mill at Sutton Road, Plymouth. He has seen many changes in Brixton in his life. He has seen many of the woods and fields go to build houses. He has seen many more cars on the roads and the lack of horses. He is very active and owns and rides two motor bikes. He also keeps a vegetable garden. He says he will be sad when we get our new school but he sees the need for it.
